sentences.sentence: "John," Wendy said falteringly, "perhaps we don't remember the old life as well as we thought we did."
sentences.translation: “约翰，”温迪迟疑地说，“也许我们对过去的生活不像我们以为的那么清楚了。”

sentences.sentence: Falteringly she took out a match and lit it.
sentences.translation: 踉跄她拿出火柴扑灭它。

sentences.sentence: "It is the one called 'the Milky Way,'" Dr. Thaddeus falteringly replied.
sentences.translation: “它叫银河系。”泰迪斯博士结结巴巴地回答道。
